comments.text:
Yeah, they'd flip if they knew.....but with that being said, I worked 
construction and one guy I rode in to the various sites with we always 
talked about his relationship issues....and one time we were sitting around 
at lunch talking about this great chicken recipe one guy had.....then the 
site boss walked over and said "ok you bunch of homos, back to work" 
lol.....

The thing is, ladies, different guys talk about different things....some 
(whose sole purpose in life is to get laid) all they do is talk about 
women. Some who have progressed past that, talk about everything and 
anything. You'd be surprised how many talk about relationship issues.....
BTW: BOYS talk about sex with their SOs with their buddies, MEN don't......﻿
